name: Moonlit King
description: The Moonlit King embodies the mystical qualities of the night, appearing as a medium-sized fey with a regal demeanor.
memorable: The Moonlit King can teleport in moonlight, summon a lunar devil, and has an extraordinary spellcasting ability.
goals: Protect the natural world and maintain the balance of the night.
relations: May be encountered with other fey creatures or allies of the night.
environment: Typically found in areas illuminated by moonlight, such as enchanted forests.
strengths: Immunity to cold, fire, and poison damage; highly resilient due to legendary resistances.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to attacks made with cold iron weapons.
attacks: Uses the Crystal Staff for melee strikes and the Moon Bolt spell for ranged attacks, dealing radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Animate Shadows can deal significant necrotic damage and reduce a target's Strength.
equipment: Crystal Staff, a magical weapon that enhances its damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet and has a high passive perception of 20.
skills: Proficient in Arcana and has notable perception skills.
additional_information: Has an array of powerful spells including Heal and Moonbeam.
Legendary Actions allow it to manipulate moonlight and attack without taking opportunity attacks.
Shadow Slip grants it defensive capabilities against attackers.
Summons a lunar devil to aid in combat.
spellcasting: Casts spells such as continual flame, invisibility, and moonbeam at will; also has higher level spells like heal and major image available.
test_queries: creature immune to cold and poison
